titles.title: Hymn 52 - Calvary Covers It All
Calvary covers it all, The Saviour Alone

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Far dearer than all that
The world can impart
Was the message that came
To my (To my heart)
Now that Jesus alone
For my sin did atone
And calvary covers it all

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The stripes that He bore and
The thorns that He wore
Told His mercy and love
For evermore (For evermore)
And my heart bowed in shame
As I called on His name
And calvary covers it all

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Calvary covers it all
My past with its sin and stain
My guilt and despair
Jesus took on Him there
And calvary covers it all

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
How matchless the grace
When i looked in the face
Of this Jesus my crucified
Lord (Of my Lord)
My redemption complete
I then found at His feet
And calvary covers it all

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
How blessed the thought
That my soul by him bought
Shall be His in the glory
On high (His on high)
Where with gladness and song
I'll be one of the throng
And calvary covers it all
